item.title: The Gastrointestinal Quality and Safety (GIEQs) Foundation
item.description: The Gastrointestinal Quality and Safety (GIEQs) Foundation is a not-for profit organisation dedicated to improving quality and safety in everyday endoscopic practice.

item.title: GIEQs' Webinar Series 2023
item.description: We are excited to present the GIEQs Webinar Series 2023. We have selected topics to delve deeper into some of the subjects introduced in the yearly GIEQs III symposium. Shortly we will add individual registration links. All our webinars can be accessed with a GIEQs PRO subscription.
